plot: A gay reporter comes out of the closet. His pimp nephew's prostitute girlfriend is pregnant, and his lover leaves him.
title: Me and My Baby in Miami
plot_es: A gay reporter comes out of the closet. His pimp nephew's prostitute girlfriend is pregnant, and his lover leaves him.
original_name: Me and My Baby in Miami
plot_en: A gay reporter comes out of the closet. His pimp nephew's prostitute girlfriend is pregnant, and his lover leaves him.
